words.definition: If ideas are abstract, they are based on general ways of thinking.
words.example: The idea of beauty is abstract.

words.definition: If something is annual, it happens once a year.
words.example: The town has an annual festival.

words.definition: Clay is a type of heavy, wet soil used to make pots.
words.example: She made a bowl out of clay.

words.definition: Cloth is material used to make clothes.
words.example: His shirt is made of soft cloth.

words.definition: A curtain is a cloth hung over a window.
words.example: She opened the curtains to let light in.

words.definition: To deserve is to be worthy of something.
words.example: The dog deserved a bone for behaving well.

words.definition: Feathers are the things covering birdsâ€™ bodies.
words.example: The bird has colorful feathers.

words.definition: If land is fertile, it is able to produce good crops.
words.example: The farmer grew many vegetables in the fertile soil.

words.definition: A flood is an event in which water covers an area of land.
words.example: The heavy rain caused a flood.

words.definition: Furniture is things like tables and chairs.
words.example: We bought some new furniture for the house.

words.definition: A grave is the place where a dead person is buried.
words.example: We put flowers on my grandfather's grave.

words.definition: If something is ideal, it is perfect.
words.example: This is an ideal place for a picnic.

words.definition: Intelligence is the ability to learn and understand.
words.example: She is a woman of great intelligence.

words.definition: Nowadays means at the present time.
words.example: Nowadays, many people use the Internet.

words.definition: To obtain something is to get it.
words.example: I need to obtain a passport before I travel.

words.definition: If someone is religious, they have a belief in a god.
words.example: He is a very religious man.

words.definition: If something is romantic, it is related to love.
words.example: They had a romantic dinner.

words.definition: A shell is the hard outer part of a sea animal.
words.example: I found a beautiful shell on the beach.

words.definition: A shore is the land along the edge of an ocean.
words.example: We walked along the shore at sunset.

words.definition: A wheel is a round thing on a car or bike.
words.example: The car has four wheels.
